p: DJE conceived of the study, organized the structure and contributed to the research and writing, and was overall responsible for the development of the research and the manuscript. RS, VS, TAH, KH, JAM, and JRW contributed to the literature analysis, organization of written sections, and writing of the manuscript. PW conducted extensive research, analysis, and constructed and linked the tables. BB contributed the sections on biocrimes and bioterrorism. CB-O contributed the viral taxonomy components of the manuscript. CM contributed the phylogenetic organization sections, plant pathogen research, and generated the figures.
